QuestData.Title: Word on the Street
QuestData.Description: Hey, $n. There's a girl in the inn that's asking about you. Her name's Leryssa.$B$BI don't think she knows you, but she said she needed your help. She sounded really desperate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Leryssa at the inn in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for coming to see me. I didn't know who else to contact.
